channel.title: Charlie on Jeremy Roschelle
channel.description: Recent content in Charlie on Jeremy Roschelle

item.title: Yussef Dayes
item.description: The best young jazz drummer in the UK played DC’s history Howard Theater, and this was the occasion for 13-year old Charlie’s first concert. Charlie is Audrey’s nephew and an aspiring drummer. After fortifying ourselves at Ben’s Chili Bowl with Half Smokes, we join a young and diverse crowd waiting through a DJ’s set to get to the main show. We positioned our selves in the standing-room-only crowd with some space by the sound board.
